title: Example-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Skill Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of middle school-level foundational mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Targeting entry-level professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, focusing on cultivating mathematical problem-solving skills necessary for job performance

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world scenario-based math problems by applying the example-problem sequencing model with 85% or higher accuracy
Learners can reproduce example learning content presented in simulation environments with 90% or higher accuracy
Learners can explain and revise logical steps in problem-solving processes three or more times in VR-based formative assessments

resources: VR Content for Mathematical Problem Simulation
